item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0514; 10:08AM; 6320 E Ruby St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GHYm29; Highland Park; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters achieved full extinguishment in 21 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters encountered significant storage within the attic which delayed their ability to reach the seat of the fire. Additional crews conducted salvage operations on the interior (which remained clear of fire) to protect belongings from water/smoke damage. There was a roofing operation underway at the time of the fire. Official cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E201 E212 E42 E44 E55 RA12 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0514; 09:47AM; 6320 E Ruby St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GHYm29; Highland Park; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing from converted attic with an additional structure exposed. One more task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E212 E42 E55 RA12 T12; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1727; 09:37PM; 439 N Sierra Bonita Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V7cC8K; #Fairfax; It took 22 LAFD firefighters just 18 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish flames on the second floor of at two-story duplex. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E227 E229 E261 E41 E52 RA41 RA861 T27 T29 T61; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1727; 09:37PM; 439 N Sierra Bonita Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V7cC8K; #Fairfax; Two-story four-plex with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E227 E261 E41 RA41 RA861 T27 T61; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1629; 09:26PM; 7707 N Melita Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Xr6gml; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E239 E289 E81 RA89 T39 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1629; 09:02PM; 7707 N Melita Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Xr6gml; Sun Valley; One story, single family dwelling with moderate smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and it appears to be an attic fire. There are no other structures exposed.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E239 E289 E81 RA89 T39 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0554; 10:10AM; 112 W 5th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vtI6Mb; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 22 minutes after receiving the alarm, the first engine company on scene ascended the stairwell to the 11th floor. They located a contents fire, held in check by fire sprinklers, and fully extinguished the fire ensuring it was contained to one unit. The hallway is clear of smoke and no evacuation is required. There is some residual water on the 10th and 11th floors and firefighters are taking equipment up to conduct a water removal operation. One patient (age/gender unknown) is being evaluated for possible smoke inhalation. It is unknown at this time where the patient was located in the building. ; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM722 E10 E11 E203 E209 E210 E211 E3 E4 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA803 RA809 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - High Rise; INC#0554; 09:48AM; 100 E 5th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XuXjIE; Downtown; 13 story residential high rise building with moderate smoke showing (and confirmed smoke alarm activation) from one unit on (approximately) the 11th floor. Firefighters are in a "High Rise" offensive operation with the first truck company initiating lobby operations and the engine ascending the stairwell. Two additional task forces were requested and are reflected in this alert. ; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM722 E10 E11 E203 E209 E210 E211 E3 E4 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA803 RA809 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Fatality; INC#1174; 04:04PM; 540 W 88th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AFTmal; #VermontVista; Twenty-two LAFD firefighters responded to find a detached garage on fire. The small detached structure contained excessive storage and had been converted to a living space. Firefighters extinguished the flames in 17 minutes (4:21pm) from the time of alarm. Sadly, one adult female was found deceased inside the structure. Cause under active investigation. LAPD Inc #3148.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC13 CM32 E233 E264 E266 E33 E46 E57 RA264 RA57 RA857 SQ21 T33 T64; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire #LongBeachFire 11/20/2022 INC#0159

item.description: Update #LongBeachFire Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0159; 03:40PM; 1456 S Long Beach Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UQnOGY; #Downtown; LAFD Firefighters and Investigators have remained at the scene of this fire through the morning and afternoon, cooling large volumes of smoldering debris while continuing to seek a definitive cause of the fire. Shortly after noon today, the remains of an adult male (unknown site affiliation / circumstances) were discovered in the rubble. An LAFD Human Remains Detection Canine Team systematically searched the site, and found no immediate indication that additional deceased persons might be on site. A positive identification of the decedent, as well as the cause, time and manner of their death, will be determined by the Coroner. Media Inquiries: LAPD Newton Incident #475 and Coroner.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; CH7; Brian Humphrey
